Eat one extra meal every day during pregnancy Eat plenty of fruits and vegetables Take iron and folic acid tablet Avoid heavy work , rest more Sleep under an insecticide treated bed net Go for ANC visit as soon as possible , and at least 4 times during pregnancy

string-array.name: care_during_pregnancy
string-array.item: Eat one extra meal every day during pregnancy
Eat plenty of fruits and vegetables
Take iron and folic acid tablet
Sleep under an insecticide treated bed net
Go for ANC visit as soon as possible , and at least 4 times during pregnancy

string-array.name: danger_signs_during_pregnancy
string-array.item: Breaking of water, getting tired easily, and swelling of the face and hands, breathlessness.

string-array.name: care_after_birth
string-array.item: Eat two extra meals during breastfeeding period
Give only breast milk to the baby and keep the baby warm all the time
Sleep with the baby under an insecticide treated bed net
